question.text: For how long is a Statutory Off Road Notification (SORN) valid?

explanation.text: A SORN allows you to keep a vehicle off road and untaxed. SORN will end when the vehicle is taxed, sold or scrapped.

answer.text: Until the vehicle is taxed, sold or scrapped
Until the vehicle is insured and MOT'd
Until the vehicle is repaired or modified
Until the vehicle is used on the road
